item.title: 中国在贸易谈判前暂停对杜邦的反垄断调查
item.description: 在下周与美国举行第三轮贸易谈判之前，中国暂停了对杜邦公司本地部门的反垄断调查，这可能是一种善意的姿态。【原文：China has suspended its antitrust investigation into the local unit of DuPont de Nemours Inc. in a potential goodwill gesture ahead of the third round of trade talks with the US next week.】

item.title: 海地最富有的人之一因涉嫌团伙犯罪面临被美国驱逐出境的危险
item.description: 海地最富有、最有权势的人之一是美国永久居民，在当局指控他与加勒比国家的黑帮勾结后，他正等待被驱逐出境。【原文：One of Haiti’s richest and most powerful men, and a permanent US resident, is awaiting deportation after authorities accused him of collaborating with the Caribbean nation’s gangs.】

item.title: 联合国负责人表示，到 2030 年，人工智能应 100% 使用可再生能源
item.description:

item.title: 尼日利亚维持利率以监控通胀和外部风险
item.description: 尽管通胀连续第三个月降温，尼日利亚央行仍维持基准利率不变，允许决策者有更多时间评估美国贸易关税对基本价格压力的影响。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank kept its benchmark interest rate unchanged despite inflation cooling for a third consecutive month, allowing policymakers more time to assess the impact of US trade tariffs on underlying price pressures.】

item.title: Glendon Capital 在私募股权投资热潮的 "解体 "中看到了机遇
item.description: Glendon Capital 联合创始人 Holly Kim 认为，私募股权公司在努力为投资者实现回报的同时，也可能为不良债权投资者提供机会。【原文：Private equity firms struggling to realize returns for their investors are likely to offer an opportunity for distressed debt investors, according to Glendon Capital co-founder Holly Kim.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告特朗普关税无法解决全球失衡问题
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，全球经济失衡加剧，主要是受美国和中国国内政策的驱动，而关税对解决这些问题作用不大。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said imbalances in the global economy have increased, driven principally by domestic policies in the US and China that tariffs will do little to address.】

item.title: 沙特健身公司首次上市即大涨，一反 IPO 放缓态势
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯健身运营商体育俱乐部公司（Sport Clubs Co.【原文：Shares of Sport Clubs Co., a Saudi Arabia-based fitness operator, soared in their trading debut on Tuesday, bucking a streak of muted listings in the kingdom.】

item.title: 爱尔兰在关税背景下制定谨慎的预算方案
item.description: 爱尔兰政府为下一个预算方案制定了更加谨慎的支出计划，这表明政府正在收紧银根，因为全球贸易动荡有可能导致这个以跨国公司为主的经济体增长放缓。【原文：The Irish government outlined a more cautious spending plan for its next budget package, a sign it is tightening the purse strings as global trade turmoil risks slowing growth in the multinational-dominated economy.】

item.title: 随着监管机构采取行动，联合信贷银行为竞购 BPM 银行赢得了更多时间
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利市场监管机构将意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购要约叫停了 30 天。【原文：Italy’s market regulator halted UniCredit SpA’s takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA for 30 days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Seven & i 否认拒绝 Couche-Tard 460 亿美元的收购要约
item.description: Seven & i Holdings Co.反驳了 Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.关于该公司拒绝就潜在合并进行有意义谈判的说法，称这家加拿大收购方没有足够重视反垄断问题，也不了解日本的商业运作方式。【原文：Seven & i Holdings Co. pushed back against Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc.’s assertions that it refused to engage in meaningful talks over a potential merger, saying that the Canadian suitor didn’t take antitrust concerns seriously enough and doesn’t understand how business is conducted in Japan.】

item.title: 莫桑比克马普托港骚乱后吞吐量急剧下降
item.description: 据莫桑比克马普托港运营公司称，在贸易不确定性和社会动荡的影响下，该港今年上半年的货运量急剧下降。【原文：Mozambique’s Maputo port suffered a steep drop in shipments during the first half of the year amid trade uncertainties and social unrest, according to the company that runs its operations.】

item.title: Blackstone 收购网络运营公司 NetBrain 大部分股份
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 正收购 NetBrain Technologies Inc. 的多数股权，再次押注人工智能将改变价值 300 亿美元的网络运营解决方案市场。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is acquiring a majority stake in NetBrain Technologies Inc. in a fresh bet that artificial intelligence will transform the $30 billion network operations solutions market.】

item.title: 伊朗人在与以色列开战前成为间谍软件的目标

item.description: 从迈阿密开往奥兰多的 "光明线 "列车被誉为美国铁路旅行未来的另一种愿景，但它却让一些投资者焦虑不安。【原文：The Brightline train running from Miami to Orlando, lauded as an alternative vision for the future of American rail travel, is making some investors anxious.】

item.title: 麻省理工学院的安德鲁-罗（Andrew Lo）认为人工智能五年内就能管理你的资金
item.description: 一年前，安德鲁-罗（Andrew Lo）向 ChatGPT 征求对 Moderna 公司的意见，这是一只在大流行病时期飙升的生物技术股。建议是：卖出。他没有卖。该股暴跌。【原文：A year ago, Andrew Lo asked ChatGPT for its opinion on Moderna Inc., a biotech stock that soared during the pandemic era. The advice: sell. He didn’t. The stock plunged.】

item.title: Alphabet 盈利乐观超越迫在眉睫的反垄断风险
item.description: 在连续数月表现逊于科技同行之后，Alphabet 公司的股价终于出现了生机，因为投资者押注强劲的盈利表现将超过对即将到来的反垄断裁决的担忧。【原文：After months of underperforming their tech peers, Alphabet Inc. shares are finally showing signs of life as investors bet that a strong earnings performance will outweigh concerns about a looming antitrust ruling.】

item.title: Paytm 实现盈利，创始人扭亏为盈
item.description: 随着销售额的增长和成本的下降，Paytm 公布了罕见的利润，这标志着这家金融科技公司在一年多前印度银行监管机构的限制措施对其大部分业务造成损害后正在反弹。【原文：Paytm reported a rare profit as sales grew and costs fell, signaling the fintech firm is bouncing back after the Indian banking regulator’s curbs more than a year ago hurt much of its business.】
